doc.plot: Lee gets an unexpected visit from his best mate Jon, who seems depressed at best. He's come fresh from a fight with girlfriend Sarah, a fight where she told him something he really didn't want to know, something she probably wouldn't tell him again given the chance, and something that Lee definitely doesn't want to hear either.
